en.title: Software Engineer
en.description: Contributed to the development of a multi-platform mobile application used by 500,000+ users, focusing on backend development and database optimization. Collaborated in a cross-functional team to design and implement user-centric features, enhancing customer satisfaction ratings by 15%.

en.title: Senior Software Engineer
en.description: Lead a team of 8 software engineers in the development of a high-traffic e-commerce platform, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement.  Spearheaded the migration of legacy systems to cloud-based architecture, enhancing system scalability and reducing operational costs by 25%.
A look into my work experience and career journey.
en.title: Professional Experience
